h1: Calories in a Slice of Provolone Cheese

quick_answer.text: One slice of provolone cheese contains about 100 kcal and 7 g protein.

faqs.q: How many calories are in one slice of provolone cheese?
faqs.a: Approximately 100 kcal per standard 1 oz slice.

faqs.q: What is the protein content in a slice of provolone?
faqs.a: About 7 g of protein per slice.

faqs.q: Is provolone cheese high in sodium?
faqs.a: Yes, around 338 mg sodium per slice, so watch intake if on a low-sodium diet.

faqs.q: How much fat is in provolone cheese per slice?
faqs.a: Roughly 7.7 g total fat, with 4.8 g saturated.

faqs.q: Does provolone have carbs or fiber?
faqs.a: Very low: 0.6 g carbs and 0 g fiber per slice.
